description:
A light and fast trail shoe that offers all the support and durability of much heavier boot, with incredible breathability. The upper uses a wrapped construction to provide control on rough ground, with mesh inserts to keep feet cool and comfortable. The waterproof-breathable membrane provides protection when your trail turns to a river.

  • Durable Nubuck leather upper with synthetic Nano-Cell™ inserts for breathability
  • Waterproof GORE-TEX® Surround lining keeps water out
  • 3D flex ankle for lateral flexibility
  • Removable Ortholite insole
  • Compression molded EVA midsole cushions and stabilizes
  • Vibram® Nano outsole with XS-Trek rubber and an Impact Brake System for durable grip and control
name: La Sportiva Nucleo High II Gore-Tex Surround Light Trail Shoes - Men's
